build_stage.command: poetry run pex . -o app.pex $(poetry run python -c "import pkgutil;import poetry_with_scripts;modules = [name for _, name, _ in pkgutil.iter_modules(poetry_with_scripts.__path__)];print('-m poetry_with_scripts' if '__main__' in modules else '--script script');") --validate-entry-point &>/dev/null || (echo 'Build failed. Could not find entrypoint' && exit 1)
